description:
Everything your garden needs to thrive

Give your garden the complete package with six powerful formulas – featuring organic dry nutrients and liquid garden fertilizers for flowers, vegetables, and soil health.

This complete kit delivers professional-level garden care combining organic dry fertilizers, fast-acting liquid nutrients, and soil amendments. Perfect for garden beds, containers, and starters, you'll get beautiful blooms, bountiful harvests, and healthier soil – plus a convenient sprayer for easy application.

Sunday garden solutions are created without pesticides or harsh chemicals—so you can enjoy your garden and get your hands dirty—not your plants.

sections.kit_benefits:
Complete nutrition for flowers and vegetables
Formulas for bigger veggies and blooms
Supports fruiting, flowering, and overall plant growth
Enhances soil health naturally
Ideal for all regions and gardens
Easy-to-use application systems
Safe for use on edible plants
sections.whats_included:
Dry Fertilizers:
2 Flower & Rose Organic Garden Fertilizer (4-4-6 NPK): High phosphorus and potassium dry organic nutrients for flowering plants.
2 Veggie & Tomato Organic Garden Fertilizer (5-4-4 NPK): High nitrogen dry organic nutrients for abundant veggie harvests.
1 WonderFert Flower Garden Fertilizer (3-8-7 NPK): Fast-acting liquid flower fertilizer formula for healthy flowering and rooting.
1 Sunday Organics Veggie & Tomato (3-3-4 NPK): Bio-digested liquid vegetable fertilizer formula for bigger harvests.
1 Sunday Organics Soil Booster Soil Amendment: Soil amendment and root enhancer.
2 Hose-End Garden Sprayer: Easy-to-use applicator for all WonderFert liquid products.
sections.instructions:
For best results, apply to actively growing plants in the morning or evening.
Start with dry fertilizers: Apply according to package rates, work into soil around plants, and water thoroughly. Reapply every 4-6 weeks.
Add soil amendment: Apply Soil Booster regularly, alternating with regular watering and using up to weekly as needed.
Finish with liquid fertilizers: Attach sprayer to bottle and apply directly to soil around plants. Use every 4-6 weeks.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
What's the best way to use this complete kit?
Start with dry organic fertilizers at planting time for long-lasting nutrition. Support with liquid fertilizers during the growing season for fast-acting feeding. Use Soil Booster regularly to maintain healthy soil.
How often should I apply each product?
Apply dry and liquid fertilizers every 4-6 weeks according to the label, and apply Soil Booster weekly or monthly for best results.
Can I use all products on edible plants?
Yes! All products are safe for both ornamental and edible gardens. Just harvest vegetables after applications have dried or have been watered in.
Will these products work for container gardens?
Absolutely! Perfect for both in-ground gardens and containers. Just adjust application rates for plants and container size.
How to Apply Sunday Garden Fertilizers & Soil Nutrients
Discover the simplicity of nurturing your garden with Sunday’s range of garden fertilizers and soil amendments. Our step-by-step guide makes growing healthy and vibrant plants easy and effective.
